channel.title: Start with Equips
channel.description: How do you make the users start with stuff equipped? I really need the code.

item.title: Start with Equips
item.dc:creator: @valiken valiken
item.description:
@valiken wrote:

I found both of these

public void youdied() { for(int r=0; r<playerEquipment.length; r++) { try { int item = playerEquipment[r]; if((item > 0) && (item < 10000)) { remove(item, r);
and

[code]public void KillPlayer() {

	if (IsDeadTimer == false) {
		actionAmount++;
		actionTimer = 0;
		ResetAttack();
		ResetAttackNPC();
		setAnimation(0x900);
		IsDeadTimer = true;
                    ApplyDead();
	}
	if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true) {
		youdied();
                    teleportToX = 3254;
		teleportToY = 3420;
		IsDeadTeleporting = true;
		resetAnimation();
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                    NewHP = 100;
                    setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
                    playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
                    PoisonDelay = 9999999;
                    KillerId = playerId;
	}

}[/code]
WHICH DO I GET RID OF???

Read full topic

item.title: Start with Equips

item.description:
@delta wrote:

Find youdied(); or applyDead(); somewhere near the login area, and remove it

Read full topic

item.title: Start with Equips
item.dc:creator: @scootkid scootkid
item.description:
@scootkid wrote:

You Need To Open Your Player.java File
Search “Unique”
It Should Come Up With Something like This-

//Giving the player an unique look playerEquipment[playerHat]=-1; playerEquipment[playerCape]=-1; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=-1; playerEquipment[playerChest]=-1; playerEquipment[playerShield]=-1; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=-1; playerEquipment[playerHands]=-1; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=-1; playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=-1;
Then you just put in whatever item id you want
if you want it blank leave it as -1

Hope it works for ya! Tell me if you have any problems.
YW

Read full topic
